thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 14 of 657
thread.title: LW

author: LW
title: LW
text: Love the glasses. Fit well and look great. Just had some problems with the amount of time the order took to fill. Ordered on Dec. 6 and received on Dec.30. I was told the glasses didn't pass inspection which delayed it and then there was some delay in the shipping where it took 3 days to be delivered. Not really they're fault but still a little frustrating. So great glasses not 100% satisfied with the speed of delivery but overall very happy.
